name: Texas A&M Motorcycle Club
description:
The purpose of the Texas A&M University Motorcycle Club is to raise awareness of the motorcycling community in the Bryan/College Station and provide riders with opportunities to meet and hang out with other motorcycle riders. We strive to bring motorcyclist's together and promote safe riding as a form of sport and of transportation. Member benefits include exclusive discounts through local and area sponsors, help with maintenance and technique, and participation in once-a-semester trip to places like the borderland hill country and ozark mountains.

Find and join the local motorcycling Facebook group, "Brazos Valley Sport Riding" for more info and updates.
summary: The purpose of the Texas A&M University Motorcycle Club is to raise awareness of the motorcycling community in the Bryan/College Station and provide riders with opportunities to meet and hang out with other motorcycle riders. We strive to bring motorcy.
